thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au
thread.title: NORM
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by NORM

author: NORM
title: NORM
text: A faultless example of customer service, our flight was 4 1/2 hours late but not a problem to the Redspot girls, stayed back late and still waiting and smiling when we finally arrived after 9pm.. The car was clean, ready to go and ran perfectly the whole time. Not our first time with Redspot and never had a problem ever, Thanks Redspot .
